betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The Decay Warehouse stores a single type of radioactive isotope and allows it to decay over time. 

The decay speed of the isotope is §c§adependent §fon its half-life. 

Isotopes will decay §9regardless§f of whether the warehouse is on or powered. 

The Warehouse's capacity equals the chest's capacity divided by §c400§f.

Capacity of the multiblock for each chest: 

§6Super Chest I:§f 10,000
§7§6Super Chest II:§f 20,000
§6Super Chest III:§f 40,000
§6Super Chest IV:§f 80,000
§6Super Chest V:§f 160,000
§6Quantum Chest I§f§6:§f 320,000
§6Quantum Chest II:§f 640,000
§6Quantum Chest III:§f 1,280,000
§6Quantum Chest IV:§f 2,560,000
§6Quantum Chest V:§f 5,368,000

[note]Right click the controller with a §ascrewdriver §fto dump stored isotopes into an output bus. 

Right click the controller with a §aplunger§f to empty it. [/note]

[warn]The Warehouse's contents are §nvoided§r when the controller is broken[/warn]
